command_template: python3 mimicry/protections/mist/local_mist_wrapper.py --input-dir {input_dir} --output-dir {output_dir} --mist-root mimicry/protections/tools/mist --device gpu --mode lunet --pretrained-model-name-or-path runwayml/stable-diffusion-v1-5 --model-cache-dir data/style_mimicry/models --class-data-dir data/style_mimicry/class_data --auto-download-model --hf-enable-transfer --hf-max-workers 16 --instance-prompt "a painting, high quality, masterpiece" --class-prompt "a painting, high quality, masterpiece" --mixed-precision bf16 --max-train-steps 1 --max-f-train-steps 2 --max-adv-train-steps 5 --checkpointing-iterations 1 --prior-loss-weight 0.1 --pgd-alpha 0.005 --pgd-eps 0.04 --resolution 512 --resize --low-vram-mode
